title: Tete Montoliu - 1974 - Songs For Love (1997) FLAC
description:
Tete Montoliu - 1974 - Songs For Love (1997)

This 1971 studio date features Tete Montoliu alone at the piano; the pianist is in great form throughout the date. The most familiar songs include an intricate hard bop rendition of "Here's That Rainy Day," a formidable interpretation of John Lewis' "Django," and a poignant arrangement of the often overly sentimental "Autumn in New York." There are four Montoliu originals: the up-tempo, somewhat daredevil "Gentofte 4349," the mesmerizing but difficult to follow "Apartment 512," the lovely "Ballad for Line," and the playful "Little Camila." This is a rewarding CD which will very likely be difficult to locate. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Here's That Rainy Day
02 - Django
03 - Two Catalan Songs
04 - Gentofte 4349
05 - Apartment 512
06 - Autumn In New York
07 - Ballad For Line
08 - Little Camilla

Most of these tracks fail the check with Audiochecker but this happens often with solo piano recordings.
Enjoy and share!
